amendment.description: To rename the NIH Muscular Dystrophy Cooperative Research Center (MDCRC) program in honor of the late Senator Paul D. Wellstone of Minnesota.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1645 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1645 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11329-11330; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11329-11330) To rename the NIH Muscular Dystrophy Cooperative Research Center (MDCRC) program in honor of the late Senator Paul D. Wellstone of Minnesota.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1645 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 1542.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1645 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
